category.name: Product Structure.Appearance Configuration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_appr_allow_remote_query
preference.preference_description: Indicates if the querying for remote appearances (ones associated with a remote published appearance-root) is to be enabled or not. Valid values are true/false. NOTE: To publish an appearance-root, ensure that AppearanceRoot is in the list for TC_publishable_classes preference.
